title: How to publish a book set in the Harry Potter universe (fantasy, fiction, writing, IP, lawsuits, legal troubles) - Quora

response.answer_text: You can write a fanfiction and publish it online. There are fanfiction websites out there for you to publish your story on, such as FanFiction, Archive of Our Own etc. You won’t make any money off of it of course. Harry Potter is owned by JK Rowling and the characters and settings all belong to her. Don’t try doing anything else unless you have a burning desire to be sued. (And I would heartily approve. HP is HER property. Don’t steal.)

Fanfiction, non-profit - ever in any way. Remember JK Rowling sued the hell out of a school for making a model of Hogwarts. She will come for you, your family and your children’s children if you trespass on her IP.
